definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: How old is the cruise ship?
sentences.chinese: 这邮轮的船龄有多长了？

sentences.english: In May 1915, the ship left New York City for Liverpool.
sentences.chinese: 一九一五年五月，这艘邮轮从纽约市开回利物浦。

sentences.english: The Mares Cruise Journey Backpack has rugged construction with spiral zips and metal pull.
sentences.chinese: 母马邮轮之旅背包已与螺旋拉链和金属拉坚固的结构。

sentences.english: I like to go to Battery Park and watch those liners booming in.
sentences.chinese: 我爱巴特里公园，喜欢看着熙熙攘攘的邮轮。

sentences.english: How many passengers can this cruise ship hold?
sentences.chinese: 这艘邮轮可乘载多少船客呢？

sentences.english: If you get one of the cruise packages, you can get everything inclusive.
sentences.chinese: 如果你一包的邮轮，你可以得到一切包容性。

sentences.english: With " high-end " the word to describe the cruise, Dong Hong think is not correct.
sentences.chinese: 用“高端”这个词来形容邮轮，董泓认为并不正确。

sentences.english: This time though, it stuck at a port at the Caribbean Island of Saint Martin.
sentences.chinese: 不过这次邮轮被困在加勒比海圣马丁岛的港口。

sentences.english: A few children crawled beneath the tanker in the hope of catching the spillage.
sentences.chinese: 几个小孩在邮轮下面爬，希望能够接到溢出来的水。

sentences.english: Finally, build mother's harbour of ocean liner to propose some suggestions on the port city.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对口岸都会建立邮轮母港提出一些倡议。

sentences.english: The tour package features a three-day, two-night cruise up the Nile River.
sentences.chinese: 这个套装旅游以尼罗河三天两夜邮轮之旅为号召。

sentences.english: Starboard cruise service is the largest duty-free shipboard concessionaire in the world.
sentences.chinese: 你们公司是世界上最大的邮轮免税店的承包商。

sentences.english: There are several different categories of cruise ship cabins.
sentences.chinese: 邮轮的船舱分好几个不同的舱等。

sentences.english: The various recreational facilities for cruise you turn travel Lawton.
sentences.chinese: 邮轮上的各种娱乐设施为您抚平旅途劳顿。

sentences.english: Does the cruise line offer a five-day package with a two-day stay on sea?
sentences.chinese: 这家邮轮公司有包含二日海上行的五日航程吗？

sentences.english: Prices for fourth quarter cruises are down year-over-year, too.
sentences.chinese: 第四季度邮轮价格也将低于去年同期。

definition: home port (of a ship or fleet)
